item.title: akka-http-slick-guice example
item.description:
Forked from https://github.com/knoldus/akka-http-slick

Changes:

  • Guice added
  • Changed Routes to Get, Put, Post, Delete
  • Changed urls
  • Changed Json Parser from Lift to akka-http/Spray one
  • Some fixes
Check example here:

https://www.lightbend.com/activator/template/akka-http-slick-guice https://github.com/kgoralski/akka-http-slick-guice

  • akka-http : REST
  • slick : database access & relational mapping
  • guice: dependency injection
